skillTree.name: Chaos Steed
skillTree.description: To ride a steed touched by Chaos is the right of any Sorcerer dedicated to spreading corruption.

skillTree.name: Barded Chaos Steed
skillTree.description: The already-fierce Chaos Steeds are often covered in heavy armour, making them even deadlier.

skillTree.name: Manticore
skillTree.description: Manticores are highly prized by Sorcerers, for they are creatures bathed in magic and as cruel as their riders.

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

skillTree.name: Eye of the Gods
skillTree.description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mutation
skillTree.description: The Ruinous Powers reward those who serve their interests.

skillTree.name: Warp-Touched
skillTree.description: Raw Chaos energy is deadlier than any poison. But, to a creature as monstrously resilient as this Sorcerer, it is sustenance.

	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Empower the Mighty
skillTree.description: With me at your back, nothing shall defeat us!

Weapon strength: +2% for Great Chaos Dragon and Chaos Giant units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds

skillTree.name: Source of All Magic
skillTree.description: And so I travelled North, following the winds to the terrible gate between worlds.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: -5% for all spells
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Empowered by the Gods
skillTree.description: Tremble before me, mortals!

skillTree.name: Slaaneshi Decadence
skillTree.description: Pleasure for pleasure's sake.

effects.description:
Attrition: +2% casualties suffered from Chaos territory attrition
	(local region)

Attrition: +4% casualties suffered from Chaos territory attrition
	(local region)

Attrition: +8% casualties suffered from Chaos territory attrition
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Tzeentchian Secrets
skillTree.description: The Great Schemer tempts his followers with forbidden knowledge the same way a fisherman coaxes a carp onto his hook with a succulent worm.

	(local region)

skillTree.name: Nurglite Joviality
skillTree.description: His smile is infectious.

Attrition: +2% casualties suffered from Chaos territory attrition
	(local region)

	(local region)

skillTree.name: Power Sap
skillTree.description: Drain the winds of magic before the enemy can turn them against us.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -5
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Experienced
skillTree.description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.

skillTree.name: Calming
skillTree.description: Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -1%
	(Heroes in local region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(Heroes in local region)

Miscast base chance: -4%
	(Heroes in local region)

skillTree.name: Quell
skillTree.description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -1
	(local enemy province)

Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -3
	(local enemy province)

Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -6
	(local enemy province)

skillTree.name: Onslaught
skillTree.description: With the right amount of preparation, the winds can be harnessed to empower even the soldier’s mundane weapons.

skillTree.name: Potent
skillTree.description: So great is this one’s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +3
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Spread Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Chaos corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Chaos corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Chaos corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Diabolic Splendour
backgroundSkills.description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

	(all armies factionwide)

	(local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.
